attributes.review: Do NOT get this app!! It’s cursed! As soon as I downloaded it all my hair fell out! Now I am a big bandy and will have to get a matching trump wig to cover it up! It’s a scam to make us get a trump wig to silently promote his campaign! If you like having hair, I beg you not to download this!!! Save yourself and your follicles! Don’t do it! I miss the days when I could frolic in a meadow and get my hair all full of flower petals and dirt and now I can’t! I will mediate for those who have fallen amiss to these dirty tricks 😬🧚‍♀️🍄
attributes.title: Made me go bald!

attributes.review: i bought this app in the hopes that my skin would be orange and i would finally have rights ❤️😸 but that is not what happened 😳😡💯 one day i got up from my bed and decided what cereal i should eat? i picked the frosted flakes..😝🙈 was that the right choice??😳❓ the other choice was cheerios ⭕️😋and not that i’m against circled shaped things, i wasn’t vibin with them you know 🚶🏽‍♂️💯and the same thing happened to me with this app.. i wasn’t vibing..💯😡 something about having my rights as a woman to not be allowed to have an abortion or birth control just don’t hit the same.. 💯let’s not forget the kids in cages💯.. or the police brutality💯 anyways i think i made a good decision with the frosted flakes, they taste better with a banana added just saying...
attributes.title: so lemme tell you...

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, it said something about foreign policy and if you try to mess with the United States there will be hell toupee. Then it asked for verification that I was a US citizen and wanted me to upload a copy of my birth certificate. I got in contact with someone about this and they said he had the app designed that way because he was on Xanax at the time. I kept wondering to myself why he would be taking Xanax but then I realized that’s it’s for Hispanic attacks.
attributes.title: Horrifying Experience

attributes.review: I downloaded it because I wanted to keep up to date on his campaign. But its so laggy and there are so many glitches. It has frozen up my phone so many times to where I couldn't do anything but restart it to get it to work again. It'll just randomly kick me out of the app. Its horrible. Honestly, I don't understand how an app can possibly be this bad. It's so annoying. Worst app ever. It should just be removed from the app store.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: i downloaded this app, and it just kept kicking me out whenever i tried to enter. so at this point i’m like “oh whatever could be the reason of this inconvenience?” then i get a notification from the app saying that i am not allowed in because of my “incredibly fat ankles” and i just think that is absolutely  RIDICULOUS. i mean who calls out someone’s fat ankles?! i am extremely offended and upset with this.. WORST APP EVER. 😡🤬⛓👹🤬💣😡⛓👹👹🤬💣👺⛓
attributes.title: i wish i could give zero stars😡

attributes.review: This is a very great app for Republicans like me but don’t listen to the one star reviews there fake because they don’t want trump to win the 2020 election, a TikTok  video said they wanted people to do this so he wouldn’t ban TikTok wich is not his fault so don’t listen to the one star reviews. TRUMP 2020
attributes.title: Best app ever trump 2020

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever used, it glitched my phone to where I had to pay $300 to get it fixed. Then it changed my password and I know this app did because the password was trump 2020. I then realize that it was this app that was doing everything and I soon after deleted it. I recommend not getting this app if you want to pay $300 because of a app you downloaded. Please listed and do not download it!
attributes.title: Terrible please do not get

attributes.review: This app claimed to bring me fortune and a relationship!! But instead I got a package in the mail with a soggy, A SOGGY, FRENCH FRY!! This is in no way what I signed up for! The AUDACITY that this app has to be putting FAKE NEWS out and getting people to download it in hopes of getting something good but NOTHING GOOD has come out of this!!! And when I tried to delete the app it stayed on my phone!! It won’t leave and it’s been three years! THREE WHOLE YEARS AND IT STILL WONT GO! Horrible, would never recommend!
attributes.title: The AUDACITY

attributes.review: This app stole all of my data and froze my phone. I had to buy a brand new phone!!! I know it was this app because I had no problems until I downloaded it!! I couldn’t get through reading a text without it suddenly restarting! My battery began draining, it took forever to charge, no internet apps would load. It started acting like when I open my iPad 2. Pretty much useless, don’t download this app unless you have a warranty!
attributes.title: BROKE MY PHONE

attributes.review: I came here for mr. oranges toupee but all I got was political ads. As I registered my number the app kept closing and started showing a revolving picture of Donny in a mirror with no shirt on. It was revolting to say the least as the toupee was removed and sitting sadly on the floor💅🏼. The bald spot on the orange oompa loop as head was very shiny and it burned my eyes, leaving me legally blind. When I went to delete the app, it kept changing my wallpaper to Brump with a duck on his head. Overall, not a great app🧚🏽🧚🏾‍♂️💅🏼🤪🥳😔🤮🤢
attributes.title: This app doesn’t work
